Title: Dead Presidents
Writer: Allen Hughes (story), Albert Hughes (story), Michael Henry Brown (story), Michael Henry Brown (screenplay), Wallace Terry (story "Specialist No.4 Haywood T. 'The Kid' Kirkland")
Actors: Larenz Tate, Keith David, Chris Tucker, Freddy Rodríguez
Plot: This action film, directed by the Hughes brothers, depicts a heist of old bills, retired from circulation and destined by the government to be "money to burn." However, more broadly, it addresses the issues of Black Americans' involvement in the Vietnam War and their subsequent disillusionment with progress in social issues and civil rights back home in the United States, during the 1960's.
